document.full_text: washington capitals' alexander ovechkin slotted another career milestone on tuesday, scoring a 300th goal in the 3-2 shootout win over the toronto maple leafs.
document.title: ovechkin gets 300th goal but eyes first stanley cup
lines_and_colors: washington capitals' alexander ovechkin slotted another career milestone on tuesday, scoring a 300th goal in the 3-2 shootout win over the toronto maple leafs.
